attributes.action: Force councils to immediately repair any public road that has sufficent degradation or damage that is likely to cause injury to any road user.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many councils leave reported pot holes and other serious degradation of public roads unrepaired until they see fit to take action. Councils should have to immediately take action to resolve any reported issue that is likely to directly cause or contribute to personal injury or serious damage to vehicles.
